title: Frosty the Snowman (Frosty the Snowman)
description: Everyone's favorite snowman with a magic hat, a button nose, and eyes made out of coal comes to life on Christmas every year. Based on the beloved 1969 television special, this Little Golden Book retells the whole magical story of Frosty the Snowman for boys and girls 2â€“5!
author: Diane Muldrow
